activities: TK Holdings Inc. will use this information for the following purposes: (1) comply with governmental/legal requirements; (2) human resources management; (3) business processes and management; and (4) safety and security management.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TK Holdings has an internal dispute resolution procedure and also will conduct independent audits of the procedure.  Questions, concerns, and/or complaints regarding the use or discolsure of personal information are investigated and resolved by the Vice President of Human Resources at the Company's Auburn Hills, Michigan headquarters; EU Data Protections Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for HR Data
